REMOTE | Product Owner for #1 most downloaded math app for Android ( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.troubi.kin... ) + Android coding skills + Strong English language skills + Fascination for mathematics + Fantastic compensation: substantial % of net sales

King of Math app has ~5 mn users and we have a handful of B2B contracts for developing additional apps worth 300k - 500k USD. The app needs a slight overhaul with refocus on user-experience (away from "only monetization counts"). We are a small team and work very relaxed, if the impact is right :).

Contact: michael@troubi.com
